presentation.title: Front-End Developer
presentation.text: Hey, I am Baptiste Marcon, Front-End developer based in France üìç

about.text:
My name is Baptiste Marcon, and I am a Front-End Developer. I am passionate about creating interactive and user-friendly experiences, constantly exploring new technologies and trends in web development.

Currently, I work at NEHS Digital, a company specializing in innovative digital solutions. Through this experience, I have been able to develop my skills and gain a strong expertise in Front-End development.

I am always seeking new opportunities to collaborate on interesting and challenging projects. Whether it's creating a website, developing an application, or enhancing the user experience, I am ready to take on new challenges.

Feel free to browse my portfolio to discover some of my recent projects. If you are interested in collaboration or have any questions, please don't hesitate to contact me. I would be delighted to connect with you.
